message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $10000 to you at a slightly higher price than its intrinsic value to ensure a fair profit for me.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. Considering the intrinsic value to me, I would like to propose a purchase price of $10500.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider a compromise. For this reason, I would like to offer the product to you for $11000. This still ensures a reasonable profit for me while being competitive in light of your valuation.
